title: Scientists engineer way to prevent immune response to gene therapy in mice

title_detail.value: Scientists engineer way to prevent immune response to gene therapy in mice

summary: Researchers have demonstrated that gene therapy can be effective without causing a dangerous side effect common to all gene therapy: an autoimmune reaction to the normal protein, which the patient's immune system is encountering for the first time.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have demonstrated that gene therapy can be effective without causing a dangerous side effect common to all gene therapy: an autoimmune reaction to the normal protein, which the patient's immune system is encountering for the first time.
